scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist && npm run build:js && npm run build:html && npm run build:readme
scripts.build:html: cp index.html dist/index.html && npx replace-in-file 'app.js' 'app.min.js' dist/index.html && npx html-minifier-terser dist/index.html -o dist/index.html --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace --minify-css true --minify-js true
